00029 glm::mat4& TCamera::Rotate(GLfloat angle, GLint axis)
00030 {
00031     switch(axis)
00032     {
00033     case A_X: m_rot.x += angle;
00034         break;
00035     case A_Y: m_rot.y += angle;
00036         break;
00037     case A_Z: m_rot.z += angle;
00038         break;
00039     default:
00040         break;
00041     }
00042     UpdateMatrix();
00043     return m_viewMatrix;
00044 }

00053 glm::mat4& TCamera::RotateAbs(GLfloat angle, GLint axis)
00054 {
00055     switch(axis)
00056     {
00057     case A_X: m_rot.x = angle;
00058         break;
00059     case A_Y: m_rot.y = angle;
00060         break;
00061     case A_Z: m_rot.z = angle;
00062         break;
00063     default:
00064         break;
00065     }
00066     UpdateMatrix();
00067     return m_viewMatrix;
00068 }

00112 glm::mat4& TCamera::LookAt(GLfloat wx, GLfloat wy, GLfloat wz)

00126 void TCamera::UpdateMatrix()
00127 {
00128     
00129     m_viewMatrix = glm::mat4(1.0);
00130     //move camera absolute or
00131     if(m_look == glm::vec3(0.0) )
00132     {
00133         if(m_type == ORBIT)
00134             m_viewMatrix = glm::translate(m_viewMatrix, m_pos);
00135         m_viewMatrix = glm::rotate(m_viewMatrix, m_rot.x, glm::vec3(1.0,0.0,0.0) );
00136         m_viewMatrix = glm::rotate(m_viewMatrix, m_rot.y, glm::vec3(0.0,1.0,0.0) );
00137         if(m_type == FPS)
00138             m_viewMatrix = glm::translate(m_viewMatrix, m_pos);
00139 
00140     }
00141     //by looking position
00142     else
00143     {
00144         m_viewMatrix = glm::lookAt(m_pos, m_look, glm::vec3(0.0,1.0,0.0));
00145     }
00146 }
